alert.note: Alert for Caswell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Caswell County through 600 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Baynes, or near Jericho, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yanceyville... Prospect Hill... Jericho... Topnot... Hightowers... and Baynes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
